ai.response:
I'm passionate about practical AI applications! I love rapid prototyping with modern AI tools and building working demos.

**AttentioFlow AI** is my flagship project‚Äîa PyTorch-powered system that performs real-time inference to predict cognitive states and deploy proactive nudges for attentional regulation.

I also invented a patent-pending AI network analyzer at AT&T for automated incident response.

AI should be useful, not just impressive!

about.response:
I'm Nathan Wang, a Computer Science and Business student at UW‚ÄìMadison (graduating May 2026).

I **build useful software and ship fast**. I've worked at companies like AT&T, Lumen Technologies, and Exact Sciences, tackling everything from large-scale data migrations to cybersecurity automation.

I love rapid prototyping, AI applications, and creating tools that solve real problems. When I'm not coding, I'm exploring new technologies and finding ways to make them practical.

Currently taking Big Data, AI, and Mobile App Development courses!
